Catholic Orders

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
catholic-orders:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Gabriel Müller, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland
Prof. Dr. Ueli Zahnd, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland (en)
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of catholic orders, general subclasses, related classes, properties, and instances.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about catholic orders
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Properties

catholic-orders:isMemberOf
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
